title: CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE
content:
0xFEC3766D// CreateRuntimeTexture
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE(long txd, char* txn, int width, int height);Parameters:txd: A handle to the runtime TXD to create the runtime texture in.txn: The name for the texture in the runtime texture dictionary.width: The width of the new texture.height: The height of the new texture.Returns: A runtime texture handle.Creates a blank runtime texture.
codeBlocks:
// CreateRuntimeTexture
long CREATE_RUNTIME_TEXTURE(long txd, char* txn, int width, int height);
